DOC.brief_summary: In study , 100 female student age 18 30 year old Xiamen University enrol . On first visit , blood , saliva urine sample participant collect . Then saliva urine sample collect two-week interval 6 month . Serum sample test PP150-IgG titer . Saliva urine sample use test CMV DNA PCR . The primary purpose study identify relationship baseline PP150-IgG titer CMV infection .
DOC.brief_title: The Epidemiologic Study Human Cytomegalovirus（CMV） Female Students Xiamen University
DOC.criteria: 1830 year old female student Xiamen University student serious disease
